channel.title: C on Michael Novotny
channel.description: Recent content in C on Michael Novotny

item.title: Femtochess
item.description: Femtochess – My Attempt at Tiny Chess Engines I’ve been intrigued by chess programming for as long as I’ve been programming. I’ve started more chess engine projects than I’d care to admit, but I have yet to make a chess engine that actually works and plays by all the rules (castling, en passant, etc.). Through all of my attempts, I have read a great deal about chess programming and watched a good amount of youtube videos.
